headline: Ron DeSantis Shares Health Update About Florida's First Lady
author: Leah Barkoukis
sentences: We really appreciate everybody whos prayed for her and for us over these many, many months, and at the end of the day it was not an easy thing for anyone to go through but I can tell you the prognosis couldnt be better and I look forward to her being out and about more so than ever,? DeSantis said.

As she faces the most difficult test of her life, she will have not only have my unwavering support but the support of our entire family, as well as the prayers and well wishes from Floridians across our state.
"As the mother of three young children, Casey is the centerpiece of our family and has made an impact on the lives of countless Floridians through her initiatives as First Lady,? he said at the time.

(to my radiation team, thank you for everything) pic.twitter.com/i6jAFEgPYy
 Casey DeSantis (@FLCaseyDeSantis) April 29, 2022
Floridas amazing First Lady has completed her FINAL radiation treatment!

(@teamrondesantis) April 29, 2022
DeSantis shared in October that his wife had been diagnosed with breast cancer.
BTW, for my final radiation treatment they played Sweet Florida by the Van Zant brothers ??????
Casey shared a clip of her husband's update on Twitter, thanking supporters for their prayers.
We have a feeling well be listening to https://t.co/tsgpiYFo52 a few more times this year.
The Republican said the states first lady had her final radiation treatment that morning.
Ron DeSantis shared a positive update about his wifes cancer treatment on Friday.
Casey is a true fighter, and she will never, never, never give up.?
Thanks to all for praying hard for @CaseyDeSantis.
and yes, Governor, cant wait to come back!
Thank you for all the prayers ??
